level1.about_easy_blocks: These blocks only appear on Easy difficulty.
level1.about_flag: Flag is a checkpoint. From now on, you will be able to continue the game after quit or when your character dies.
level1.about_heart: This is a heart. It heals you from 50 to 120 health points, depending on your luck.
level1.about_hp: HP (Health Points) is your health. You can lose it in various situations, e.g. being hit by fire or wounded in battle.
level1.about_pp: PP (Power Points) is your power. You can use PP in battles to deal more damage or for healing.
level1.collect_coins: Gather coins, they will come in handy.
level1.first_hostile:
And here is your first hostile!
Get closer to start the battle.
level1.level_end_pc:
Exit ahead!
Press Space to enter the door.
level1.welcome:
Level 1

Welcome to the Mystery Chamber!
But is this really a chamber?

level2.about_how_coins_increase_attack: For every 20 coins, your normal attack damage increases by 1.
level2.about_how_coins_increase_healing: For every 100 coins, you can recover 2 more health in combat.
level2.about_how_coins_increase_special_attack: For every 10 coins, your special attack damage increases by 1.
level2.about_potion: It's a potion. Refills Power Points by 50-100 points.
level2.before_boss: Before battles, especially boss fights, make sure to maximize your HP and PP, and don't skip hearts and potions!
level2.risky_place: There's something interesting, but it's risky to reach it.

level3.about_ladder: To climb a ladder, press and hold the jump button.
